content.text:
# ASTRA Award for Channel of the Year

}}
}}
The ASTRA Award for Channel of the Year was an award presented at the ASTRA Awards. It was presented at every ASTRA Awards except the first (in 2003) until its discontinuation in 2015, when ASTRA was absorbed and combined with the annual AACTA Awards.
